name: Export & Import WPBakery Page Builder
author: Tomiup

sections.description:
Export & Import templates for WPBakery Page Builder (Saved Templates/My Templates) in few clicks.

This plugin is addon for WPBakery Page Builder.

Features

  • Import/Export templates in JSON format – take your custom templates.
  • Single Export – export only those templates you wish.
  • Multi Choose – export multi choose templates you wish
    (Premium version).
  • Export All – Allow export all templates with a click
    (Premium version).
  • Multisite (Network) – export & import templates from one place.
    (Premium version).

Download Premium version here >> TEMPORT

Feedback

If you like this plugin, then please consider leaving us a good rating and a review feedback.
If would like, you can follow us on Facebook
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the “/wp-content/plugins/vc-templates-import-export/” directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” screen in WordPress.
  3. WPBakery Page Builder -> Templates Import & Export screen to use the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2 – 7/11/2023

  • Compatible with WordPress 6.3.2 and WPBakery Page Builder 7.1

1.0.1

  • Compatible with WordPress 5.9.x and WPBakery Page Builder 6.8.x

0.1.6

  • Rename to “Export & Import Templates for WPBakery Page Builder”

0.1.5

  • Compatible with WordPress 5.x and WPBakery Page Builder 5.7.x

0.1.4

  • Improvements function export template.

0.1.3

  • Improvements function export template.

0.1.2

  • Compatible with Visual Composer 5.4

0.1.1

  • Added: Export 1 or multi templates.
  • Added: Import 1 or multi templates.

0.1.0

  • Initial Release.
